commands.name: az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule create
commands.summary: Create a Mongo cluster firewall rule.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule create --cluster-name
                                              --end-ip-address
                                              --resource-group
                                              --rule-name
                                              --start-ip-address
examples:
az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule create \
--cluster-name MyCluster \
--resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--rule-name MyRule \
--start-ip-address MyStartIpAddress \
--end-ip-address MyEndIpAddress \

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule delete
commands.summary: Delete a Mongo cluster firewall rule.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule delete --cluster-name
                                              --resource-group
                                              --rule-name
                                              [--yes]
examples: az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule delete --cluster-name MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup --rule-name MyRuleName

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule list
commands.summary: Lists firewall rule on a Mongo cluster.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule list --cluster-name
                                            --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule list --cluster-name MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule show
commands.summary: Get a Mongo cluster firewall rule.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule show --cluster-name
                                            --resource-group
                                            --rule-name
examples: az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule show --cluster-name MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup --rule-name MyRuleName

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule update
commands.summary: Create a Mongo cluster firewall rule.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule update --cluster-name
                                              --end-ip-address
                                              --resource-group
                                              --rule-name
                                              --start-ip-address
examples:
az cosmosdb mongocluster firewall rule update \
--cluster-name MyCluster \
--resource-group MyResourceGroup \
--rule-name MyRule \
--start-ip-address MyStartIpAddress \
--end-ip-address MyEndIpAddress \
